name: Pizza Golf but very fast
description:
This Golf mod is usually intended for The Noise, but you can also play as Peppino.  but most of the game's attention is put onto The Noise. Press F2 for Noise Mode.

This mod removes the player's speed cap and makes their acceleration very fast, which goes faster the more speed the player gains. You can also collect more points to go even faster.

Information

You have 2 speedometers: Your MoveSpeed counter, and your WallSpeed counter. The WallSpeed Counter is what speed you'll go at next when you start dashing, allowing you to "store" speed by wallrunning.

Your MoveSpeed is the current speed you are going at. This speed will be transferred to WallSpeed if you wallrun.

Important Mechanics
  • Doing a walljump will slightly hinder your speed, preventing players from building speed via walljumps.
  • Some enemies respawn, and all enemies grant 2x points, but you lose 2x points if you get hit, to balance gameplay.
Pizza Time

During Pizza Time, gameplay changes to make the player much faster.

You accelerate 1.25x as fast, walljump speed hinderance is slightly less worse,  the timer is frozen to 1:01, and instead of losing 5 points per second, you gain 5.

This mod is clearly not serious, and is just made for fun. Have fun!
